description: Green Dragon is a smooth and fruity drink that will quickly put you in a good mood! It is a power-packed concoction of juniper and herbal flavors. All you need is gin, green creme de menthe, orange bitters, Kummel, and lemon.
name: Green Dragon
recipeIngredient: ½ oz. Green creme de menthe

recipeInstructions.name: Pour all of the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake well for about 15-20 seconds, until frothy.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into an old-fashioned glass that has been rinsed in absinthe or pastis and then drained. Serve immediately!
